LanguageData.MAP_Gestate_Hermit.label: gestate Hermit
LanguageData.MAP_Make_Mechlink.label: make mechlink
LanguageData.MAP_Make_MechBandwidthLink.label: make bandwidth coordination module
LanguageData.MAP_Make_MechBandwidthLink.description: Modify a mechlink to transform it into a mechanoid-use module capable of processing and relaying mechanoid signals. After installation on a mechanoid, it will be able to handle part of the mechanitor's bandwidth processing functions.
